name: Buildit-website
description: buildit website, task manager inspired by how to use NPM as a build tool from @Keith Cirkel
author: Jonathan Lazarini <jonathan.lazarini@wipro.com>

scripts.build: npm run build:scripts -s && npm run build:styles -s && npm run build:markup -s
scripts.build:scripts-old: browserify -d assets/scripts/main.js -p [minifyify --compressPath . --map main.js.map --output dist/main.js.map] | hashmark -n dist/main.js -s -l 8 -m assets.json "dist/{name}{hash}{ext}"
scripts.watch:semantic-ui: compass watch assets/styles --poll & npm run live-reload
scripts.sass-convert: sass-convert -R --from scss --to sass assets/styles && rm assets/styles/styles.scss
scripts.build:scripts: browserify --debug -e assets/scripts/main.js -t [ babelify --comments true ] -p [minifyify --compressPath . --map main.js.map --output dist/main.js.map] | hashmark -n dist/main.js -s -l 8 -m assets.json "dist/{name}{hash}{ext}"
scripts.build:scripts-prod: browserify --debug assets/scripts/main.js -t [ babelify --comments true ] -p [minifyify --compressPath . --map main.js.map --output dist/main.js.map] | hashmark -n dist/test/main.js -s -l 8 -m assets.json "dist/test/{name}{hash}{ext}"
scripts.build:styles: node-sass assets/styles/main.sass --source-map true -o dist/ && hashmark -s -l 8 -m assets.json dist/main.css "dist/{name}{hash}{ext}"
scripts.dev: npm run open:dev -s && parallelshell "npm run live-reload -s" "npm run serve -s" "npm run watch -s"
